description: Try our easy to follow Summer Fruit Crunch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Summer Fruit Crunch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the fruit into dishes and sprinkle over the crunchy topping. Garnish with the toasted almonds and a sprinkling of icing sugar. Serve immediately.
